messages.message:
Hey team,

We are going to *upgrade the instabase version in `Rocket - PoV sandbox`* from 22.01. We are deciding between upgrading to `22.03` or `22.04`. My concern is if there any fixes for the bugs which are not cherrypicked or fixed in either of the releases, that would increase the back and forth.

1. `Encrypted pdf` error in process files step: Ticket (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/FLOW-2456) - @upendra can you confirm if it’s fixed in both 22.03 and 22.04?
2. `Display Suggestions` error: Thread link (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C02KS5FHZEE/p1650302898710089)  - @Serena I see the PR but could you confirm if the fix is in 22.04?
3. `No ocr text in apply checkpoint`: Thread link (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CV8V33RPV/p1650379873383909) - @Kerry I feel this is yet to be fixed in 22.04, but was this working fine in 22.03?
4. `Distinguishing between validation error and flow` error: Thread link (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CV8V33RPV/p1646760956803229?thread_ts=1646727700.295779&cid=CV8V33RPV) - @Adam, could you confirm if the fix should be present in both 22.03 and 22.04?
5. `Double Annotation in ML Studio` issue - Thread link (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C02KS5FHZEE/p1649088540933279?thread_ts=1648117698.988769&cid=C02KS5FHZEE) - @Serena, I guess the fix was cherry picked to 22.03 as well?
I tagged the folks I feel were directly involved in helping with the fixes, if that’s not the case, please add the relevant person and help us get a confirmation on the same.

Thanks!

cc. @Dale DeLoy @Matt Weaver
For 3, this was reported yesterday and we haven’t fixed it yet. Can we have a week’s time? I do not think this is fixed in 22.03.
For #4, differentiating between validation failure and step error is present in both 22.03 and 22.04

Sure thing @Kerry. Was this introduced in only 22.04? I was not sure if this was even an issue in 22.03. I don’t have a sandbox where I can test it, hence the doubt.

@Adam Thanks for confirming :)
@Saikat good point, did you find the same result in 22.01, your sandbox?
if you see the bug in 22.01 (your sandbox) and 22.04 (prod), then I don’t think it’s a new bug unfortunately :disappointed: i have yet to investigate what the actual cause of the problem is.

@Kerry I ran it here solution-eng (https://solution-eng.aws.sandbox.instabase.com/apps/flow/results/ib_solutions/lending-club/fs/instabase-lending-club/Paystubs%20Marketplace%20V1/TagX/run_saikat_biswas/2022-04-19-13:03:58/090bb7fe-382e-4a40-b275-36d4405a9db6/out/batch.ibflowresults) env (22.02) No issues there :slightly_smiling_face:, so either it came in 22.03 or 22.04
when we fix this can we patch it back to 22.01?

2 - will work on getting this cherry-picked into 22.04 today
5 - yep, the fix was cherry-picked into 22.03!
1 I have yet to test & close. I'll prioritise this tomorrow as changes are ready
so for 3 it likely is not introduced in 22.01. it’s a regression in 22.04 that we catch now. for 4, backporting is a bit hard.
is there a need to upgrade now to a minor release? or would waiting for the 22.05 major release be an option?

isn't the GA release for 22.05 after mid of may @Heymian?

I doubt it would work in that case. @Matt Weaver correct me if I am wrong here with the timelines for the PoV.
We need to be done with the POV by the 19th of May
Got it, not an option then
for 2, the cherry-pick has been merged!
Wow, thanks @Serena. Super fast! And I am guessing `Display Suggestions` was not an issue in 22.03 at all?
yep the bug was introduced after 22.03
